articles.title: US scientists developing nasal spray to prevent COVID-19 - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Scientists at the University of Pennsylvania and the biotech firm Regeneron are investigating whether technology developed for gene therapy can be used to make a nasal spray that will prevent infection with the new coronavirus.

articles.title: Texas must boost COVID-19 controls, White House report says - The Texas Tribune
